forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm during the morning, then some lingering showers still possible this afternoon. High near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms during the morning followed by occasional showers this afternoon. High near 50F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
